Package com.epoch.substns

Classes for holding and analyzing R groups or variable values for algorithmic generation of questions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MovedAtoms
    Stores atoms that have been removed from or added to the molecule so they can be removed from or added to a selected fragment molecule as well.
    RGroupCollection
    Defines an R-group collection used by a Marvin question.
    RGroupDefs
    Singleton class that holds names and definitions of shortcut groups that may substitute for generic R groups in Figure 1 of R-group questions.
    RGroupReplacer
    Replaces generic numbered R groups with the corresponding shortcut group.
    SubstnUtils
    Contains methods that select the shortcut groups that will substitute for generic R groups in the molecule of Figure 1 in a particular student's view of an R-group question, and that replace those generic R groups with the shortcut groups; also contains methods that select the values that will substitute for variables in the question statement or NumberIs evaluator of a particular student's view of a numeric question.

Package com.epoch.substns Description

Classes for holding and analyzing R groups or variable values for algorithmic generation of questions.
